mapper.select: select * from tbl_user u left join tbl_user_role ur on ur.user_id=u.id and u.is_delete=0 and u.state=0

SELECT pu.url AS perUrl FROM tbl_per_url pu RIGHT JOIN ( SELECT rp.per_id FROM tbl_role_per rp LEFT JOIN tbl_user_role ur ON ur.role_id = rp.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{id} ) AS t ON t.per_id = pu.per_id

SELECT pe.id, pe.pid, pe.url, pe.route_name, pe.route_icon FROM tbl_permission pe RIGHT JOIN ( SELECT rp.per_id FROM tbl_role_per rp LEFT JOIN tbl_user_role ur ON ur.role_id = rp.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{id} ) AS t ON t.per_id = pe.id

SELECT pu.url AS perUrl FROM tbl_per_url pu RIGHT JOIN ( SELECT rp.per_id FROM tbl_role_per rp LEFT JOIN tbl_user_role ur ON ur.role_id = rp.role_id WHERE ur.login_act = #{id} ) AS t ON t.per_id = pu.per_id
